name: Thripper
description: The Thripper has an agile physique and is characterized by its chaotic nature. It is equipped with Feybane Weapons and possesses notable soft wings allowing it to fly.
memorable: The Thripper is unique for its ability to dominate against fey creatures, using its Feybane Weapons and detecting them through its Frenzy Sense.
goals: The Thripper typically seeks to hunt and overpower fey creatures using its unique abilities.
relations: It may be encountered alongside other fey hunters or creatures that thrive in fey environments.
environment: Typically found in fey-dominated areas or regions filled with magic.
strengths: The Thripper excels in combat against fey, utilizing its truesight and ability to counter spells.
weaknesses: Vulnerable to cold damage, which can exploit its defenses.
attacks: Attacks with the Extractor Spear, dealing both piercing and necrotic damage, or uses Disorienting Chitter to inflict thunder damage and disorient foes.
most_powerful_ability: Feybane Weapons allow all weapon damage against fey creatures to be treated as force damage.
senses: The Thripper has truesight up to 60 feet, allowing it to see through illusions and the true forms of creatures.
skills: Skilled in Perception with a +3 modifier, enabling it to notice hidden threats.
additional_information: Can sense the location of fey by scent within 60 feet.
Soft Wings allow limited flight, requiring solid surfaces to take off and land.
Glamour Counter ability lets it disrupt enemy spellcasters effectively.
It can regain hit points by reducing the maximum hit points of its targets.
spellcasting: Can employ Glamour Counter to disrupt enchantment and illusion spells.
test_queries: humanoid with chaos that hunts fey
monster that senses fey and flies
magical humanoid that uses special weapons
